newsitem.title: GERMANY: Goldman ups estimates for Dresdner Bank.
newsitem.headline: Goldman ups estimates for Dresdner Bank.

text.p: Goldman Sachs said on Tuesday it had raised its recommendation of Dresdner Bank AG to "market outperformer" from "market performer," after recent visits to the company.
"We think the company is doing more than the market realises to improve returns for shareholders," said Neil Crowder, banking analyst at Goldman Sachs.
Crowder said Goldman had raised its estimate for 1997 earnings per share to three marks from 2.90 marks per share.
Trade volume in Dresdner shares was the morning's heaviest, with the stock up over two percent on talk of the upgrade, rising 85 pfennigs to 40.80 marks.
